name: uSpy
description:
***Note: No sound in game is due to known bug in Unity - https://issuetracker.unity3d.com/issues/audio-no-longer-plays-in-build?_ga=2.222... ***

Please view the version with audio here: https://hephforgegaming.itch.io/uspy-working-audio  

***NO CHANGES WERE MADE TO THE GAME.  JUST RECOMPILED IN VERSION OF UNITY WITHOUT THE BUG***

In the 1960s at the height of the Cold War, tensions were high between the USSR and the USA.  The Americans were looking for any advantage they could find and took to skies in a super high-altitude plane known as the U2, to perform spy missions and gather intelligence over Soviet Airspace.

Inspired by these flights, uSpy puts you in the cockpit of a U2 spy plane flying over the USSR.  Your mission is to capture images of Soviet assets.  Each asset has a different point value.  Beware of Soviet SAM sites and leaving the prescribed airspace or you might be in for a bang!

There is both a WebGL and an x86 build.  The x86 build has extended features such as the ability to see the photos you have taken after the mission.  Unfortunately, this doesn't work in WebGL due to restrictions of the platform.

Controls:

W – Tilt Plane Down

S – Tilt Plane Up

A – Bank Plane Left

D – Bank Plane Right

Space – Capture Picture

Shift – Afterburner

Mouse Pan – Moves Camera

Scroll Wheel – Zooms Camera

More information on the U2 Spy Plane Incident

https://www.history.com/topics/cold-war/u2-spy-incident
